name: Notion Time Tracker
description: Efficiently keep track of your working sessions with the Time Tracker Notion template.Have you ever been unaware of how much time you spend working each day?The Time Tracker will give you the answer! Use this template to effortlessly track your working time and stay mindful of the hours you invest.Boost your focus and productivity by tracking your work time.Begin new sessions, engage in deep work, and conclude each session. Repeat this process, and you will have a clear understanding of the time
features: a space to start and end sessions and be mindful of the time they cost you; a space to manage your projects and apply sessions to them; + a free guide to fully catch the template features
